title: paTruvEn murugA
sahitya:
paTruvEn murugA un porppadamE shatamena


anupallavi

  shaTrum ivvAzhvu tanil sankaTam urakkavillai uTriDAdu uyya un naTruNai peTriDa nAn


caraNam    cennimalai mannavA unnaiyE nambum nAn innalurum pOdum iDukkaN urum pOdum
unnuLLam urugavE panmurai tudi sheidu ennai nI AtkoLLum iccai nI koLLavE
